A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not what I hoped for. Starting with the opening scene\, through the awkward time consuming and ultimately pointless story arcs\, to the finish which actually did \"end the way I expected\" I'd watch it again but I don't want to contribute to its box office success. Disney proved it could deliver hard hitting moments with Rogue One\, but caters to a younger crowd and basic... um people... in this film. That being said\, Mark Hamill and Carrie Fischer delivered unlike I ever expected.
